column4: what do i type in the terminal to get the latest nvidia drivers
that is, sudo apt-get install envyng-gtk
whats the command to use envy
do you not have a GUI?
If you have GNOME installed, it's Application -> System Tools -> Envy
then yeah, go to Applications -> System Tools -> EnvyNG
Unable to copy the users Xauthentication file
KDE apps will work if you have Qt installed.
GNOME apps will work if you have GTK+ installed.
There are other various dependencies though... like gnome-vfs, etc.
